EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1323993538.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1323993538.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE James,
Thanks for the reply and look forward to chatting again. Don’t let go of your dreams of independence!! J
You can book a time in my schedule by going here.
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: James Yoon [mailto:james.yoon2@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, December 08, 2011 5:42 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Steve,
Really, thanks so much for the reach back. With the passing of the big holiday rush in November and supporting a slew of high interest projects, everything kind of fell off the radar. Thank you for contacting me back. In short, YES I am still very interesting in chatting. I will open up your calendar to book a time later tonight (after I get off of client site). I briefly looked at the new page and it looks very interesting, I'll have to take a closer look when I get home tonight.
Anyway, again, thank you so much for pinging me back. I would have continued in this existence (job) all throughout the holidays, with my dreams of being independant completely forgotten, had you not emailed me back.
Thank you, James
On Wed, Dec 7, 2011 at 11:18 AM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: James,
Wanted to send off another email and see if you were still interested in chatting about the services provided by MBO Partners. We just came out with a pretty cool page that highlights some of the people who use our program. You can go here to take a look:
http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents
Any update would be great. Regards,
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
